name: Clip Reseller
description:
Summary

You are the only paperclip seller in town, import (buy) paperclip boxes and export (sell) them to the town. Reach the goal you like, 30000 coins? 20000 coins? or even 100000 coins!

This game is made for the Jame Gam #18 with the theme Time Is Money (with a lot of mechanics tied to countdown timer and affect money production in some way) and with an important objects, clips (in this case, its paperclips)

Controls

This is a mouse only game, just left click everything

Credits

All assets were made by me, Scope Ricrit

The tool I used:

Game Engine - Godot

Art or Graphic - GIMP
